Title: Home Is the Hero
Writer: Philip Howard, Henry Keating, Walter Macken (play)
Actors: Walter Macken, Eileen Crowe, Arthur Kennedy, Joan O'Hara
Plot: A man returns to his Irish town after being in jail for five years for murder. His friends try to help him fit in again, but he refuses and secludes himself from the world. Only a pretty girl and his crippled son can still reach him.
